amendatorysection.catchline: Discharging any firearm or weapon from any public highway, road, or bridge; penalty; exception.
amendatorysection.para: A person commits a Class III misdemeanor if such person discharges any firearm or weapon using any form of compressed gas as a propellant from any public highway, road, or bridge in this state, unless otherwise allowed by statute. Upon conviction, the mandatory minimum fine shall be one hundred dollars.
